Package com.redhat.rhn.frontend.events

Class Summary
AbstractDatabaseAction Base action for any action that communicates with the database.
BaseEvent BaseEvent - basic superclass that holds common event members.
BaseMailAction BaseMailAction - basic abstract class to encapsulate some common Action logic.
CloneErrataAction UpdateErrataCacheAction
CloneErrataEvent CloneErrataAction - publish event to clone the errata into a channel or a set of Channels.
NewUserAction Implement Action for TraceBackEvents
NewUserEvent An event representing an error generated from the web frontend
RestartSatelliteAction UpdateErrataCacheAction
RestartSatelliteEvent RestartSatelliteEvent - event containing necessary info to restart the satellite.
SsmChangeChannelSubscriptionsAction Handles performing subscription changes for servers in the SSM.
SsmChangeChannelSubscriptionsEvent Event fired to carry the information necessary to perform subscription changes for servers in the SSM.
SsmDeleteServersAction Handles performing subscription changes for servers in the SSM.
SsmDeleteServersEvent Event fired to carry the information necessary to perform subscription changes for servers in the SSM.
SsmInstallPackagesAction Schedules package installations on systems in the SSM.
SsmInstallPackagesEvent Event fired to carry the information necessary to schedule package installations on systems in the SSM.
SsmRemovePackagesAction Handles removing packages from servers in the SSM.
SsmRemovePackagesEvent Event fired to carry the information necessary to remove packages from servers in the SSM.
SsmUpgradePackagesAction Handles removing packages from servers in the SSM.
SsmUpgradePackagesEvent Event fired to carry the information necessary to upgrade packages on servers in the SSM.
SsmVerifyPackagesAction Schedules package verifications on systems in the SSM.
SsmVerifyPackagesEvent Event carrying information necessary to schedule package verifications on systems in the SSM.
TraceBackAction Implement Action for TraceBackEvents
TraceBackEvent An event representing an error generated from the web frontend
UpdateErrataCacheAction UpdateErrataCacheAction
UpdateErrataCacheEvent UpdateErrataCacheEvent - publish even to update the errata cache for an Org or a set of Channels.
